title: Kemono Friends 2
synopsis: Serval and Caracal find a "human" child in the forest. As they travel with the child, they meet new Friends, uncover the secrets of Japari Park, and become involved in an event that will "shake the earth."
voices: ['Ozaki, Yuka', 'Uchida, Aya', 'Ishikawa, Yui', 'Koike, Riko', 'Uchida, Aya', 'Ono, Saki', 'Motomiya, Kana']
staff: [['Numata, Shinnosuke', ['Producer']], ['Kimura, Ryuuichi', ['Director']], ['Abe, Nobuyuki', ['Sound Director']], ['Aiba, Aina', ['Theme Song Performance']]]
